# About Me

![](images/my_picture-01.jpeg){width="160"}

Christian Orji is a student of MSDS at Southern Methodist University in Dallas, Texas. He has a bachelor's degree in mathematics, Christian has worked in the field of IT Auditing, currently a Supply Specialist in the US Army. He is passionate about research and finding new ways to solve problems. He is currently stationed and resides in El paso Texas.

In my free time, I enjoy playing soccer, and I cherish quality time with my family.
